name: A lone world
description:
This is a game where you play as a schoolboy who find out that the bus left without him, so he decide to seek revenge for their sins. Horever, a surprise is waiting him...

Based on this video :

Sorry if it feels rushed, I wanted to make sure that you get the same feeling as the main character. (You get very anoyed by the super repetitive gameplay)

Made for the B&W Jam.
